argument.description: The starting date (before the n months have been added).
The number of months to add to date1.

returnType: The ADD_MONTHS function returns a date value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL ADD_MONTHS function returns a date with a specified number of months added.
sample:
ADD_MONTHS('01-Aug-03', 3)
Result: '01-Nov-03'

ADD_MONTHS('01-Aug-03', -3)
Result: '01-May-03'

ADD_MONTHS('21-Aug-03', -3)
Result: '21-May-03'

ADD_MONTHS('31-Jan-03', 1)
Result: '28-Feb-03'
